title: Porano Pasta
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A fast-casual Italian restaurant opened by award winning chef Gerard Craft. It offers create your own bowls using bases such as pasta, GF pasta, farro, rice, or kale; with a protein (spicy tofu offered), sauce, and toppings with a good amount of vegan choices. Good for both dine in and take-out; meals can be ordered online for pick-up.
